Method.name: getFormsList
Method.Implementation:
#dim sc As %Status = $$$OK set forms = []
set rs = ##class(%ResultSet).%New("%Dictionary.ClassDefinition:SubclassOf") set sc = rs.%Execute($$$adaptorClass) quit:$$$ISERR(sc)
while (rs.%Next(.sc)) { quit:$$$ISERR(sc) set className = rs.Data("Name") CONTINUE:'..formExists(className) set formName = $parameter(className, $$$formNameParam) set formObj = {"name": (formName), "class": (className)} do forms.%Push(formObj) }
quit forms
